US records 2,600 new coronavirus cases every hour as total surpasses 4 million tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748252 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748252/us-records-2-600-new-coronavirus-cases-every-hour-as-total-surpasses-4-million/story/ U.S. coronavirus cases topped 4 million on Thursday, with over 2,600 new cases every hour on average, the highest rate in the world, according to a Reuters tally. 52-year-old vendor, a mild stroke patient, hands out free taho tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748245 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/748245/52-year-old-vendor-a-mild-stroke-patient-hands-out-free-taho/story/ A 52-year-old taho vendor, who had suffered from a mild stroke, gives away free taho to the people lined up at a coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) testing area Manila, according to MJ Geronimo s Thursday report on Stand for Truth. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 23:33:11 +0800
Spain's coronavirus cases jump 2,615 amid surge in new clusters tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748249 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748249/spain-s-coronavirus-cases-jump-2-615-amid-surge-in-new-clusters/story/ MADRID - Spain's number of coronavirus cases jumped by 2,615 on Thursday, as the country struggles to contain a rash of fresh clusters of infections that have sprung up since the country lifted a strict lockdown a month ago. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 23:33:04 +0800

Thu, 23 Jul 2020 23:26:18 +0800
OFW na nagkasakit at pumanaw sa Uzbekistan, 'di alam ng mga kasamahan kung nasaan na ang bangkay niya tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748225 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/748225/ofw-na-nagkasakit-at-pumanaw-sa-uzbekistan-di-alam-ng-mga-kasamahan-kung-nasaan-na-ang-bangkay-niya/story/ Sa hindi malamang dahilan, bigla na lang umanong nanghina, nahirapang huminga at nawalan ng panlasa ang isang OFW sa Uzbekistan. Ilang araw makaraang siyang dalhin sa ospital, pumanaw ang OFW pero hindi na nalaman ng kaniyang mga kasamahan kung saan dinala ang kaniyang mga labi. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 23:21:20 +0800
Guro, ibinarter ang kaniyang projector para makagawa ng mga learning module na ipinamimigay sa mga bata tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748246 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/748246/guro-ibinarter-ang-kaniyang-projector-para-makagawa-ng-mga-learning-module-na-ipinamimigay-sa-mga-bata/story/ Ipinagpalit ng isang guro ang kaniyang pinakaiingat-ingatang projector kapalit ng mga bond paper at printer ink para makagawa ng learning modules na ipinamamahagi niya sa mga batang estudyante sa San Pedro, Laguna. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 23:17:27 +0800
Democrats preparing for nightmare scenario in which Trump challenges election results tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748243 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748243/democrats-preparing-for-nightmare-scenario-in-which-trump-challenges-election-results/story/ Democrats are mounting their most extensive voter protection effort ever to gird for what Joe Biden called his biggest fear: the prospect that President Donald Trump will try to interfere with the Nov. 3 election or refuse to accept its outcome. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 22:35:52 +0800

Ginang na 4 na taong nawawala, nakita ang bangkay sa septic tank; anak niya at nobyo nito, suspek tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748238 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/748238/ginang-na-4-na-taong-nawawala-nakita-ang-bangkay-sa-septic-tank-anak-niya-at-nobyo-nito-suspek/story/ Taliwas sa sinabi ng anak na nagpunta sa Singapore ang kaniyang ina, lumitaw na pinaslang pala ang biktima at itinago ang bangkay sa isang septic tank malapit sa kanilang bahay sa Dasmariñas, Cavite. Ang anak at kaniyang nobyo, lumitaw na silang nasa likod ng karumal-dumal na krimen. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 22:15:58 +0800
Pangilinan: Certainty of belief compelled me to question anti-terror law before SC tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748233 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748233/pangilinan-certainty-of-belief-compelled-me-to-question-anti-terror-law-before-sc/story/ Opposition Senator Francis "Kiko" Pangilinan on Thursday said his decision to question the legality of the anti-terror law before the Supreme Court is rooted in his firm belief that the measure is vulnerable to abuse under the "authoritarian" Duterte administration. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 21:43:49 +0800
Laguna teacher barters projector for ink, paper to print modules for kids tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748234 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/748234/laguna-teacher-barters-projector-for-ink-paper-to-print-modules-for-kids/story/ A teacher has bartered her five-year-old projector for a ream of bond paper and some printer ink to be able to produce learning modules for kindergarten students in San Pedro, Laguna. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 21:28:33 +0800
Build more temporary hospitals instead of reverting to MECQ, Gatchalian suggests tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748224 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748224/build-more-temporary-hospitals-instead-of-reverting-to-mecq-gatchalian-suggests/story/ The government should set up makeshift hospitals where more COVID-19 patients can be accommodated instead of imposing stricter lockdown measures in Metro Manila and other high-risk areas, according to Senator Sherwin Gatchalian on Thursday. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 20:40:12 +0800
Late priest Soganub part of efforts to build peace in Mindanao --Galvez tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748202 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748202/late-priest-soganub-part-of-efforts-to-build-peace-in-mindanao-galvez/story/ Father Teresito "Chito” Soganub was part of the government s collective efforts to build long-lasting peace in Mindanao, especially in Marawi City and Lanao del Sur, Presidential Peace Adviser Carlito Galvez Jr. said Thursday.
